item.title: Mgmt Configuration Language: Class and Include
item.description: It’s been a little over a year since I introduced the Mgmt Configuration Language. A lot has happened since then, and I’d like to introduce some of the missing features that weren’t available when the language was first introduced. If you haven’t already read that post, please start there and come back when you’re finished. In this article we’ll learn about classes. Classes: You might remember that the mgmt language called mcl has both statements, and expressions.
